description: A simple raster format for individual images first established by Truevision, Inc. in 1984 and extended in 1989.  Designed for MS-DOS color applications, TGA was the native format of Truevision's TARGA (Truevision Advanced Raster Graphics Adapter) boards.
name: Truevision TGA File format, version 2.0
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">tga</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
